clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used as alternative treatment for ascariasis caused by i Ascaris lumbricoides i roundworm and enterobiasis oxyuriasis caused by i Enterobius vermicularis i pinworm It is also used to treat partial intestinal obstruction by the common roundworm a condition primarily occurring in children

contraindications.disease: LD sub 50 sub 5 g kg Human oral Symptoms of overdose include muscle fatigue seizures and difficulty breathing
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Piperazine is an anthelminthic especially useful in the treatment of partial intestinal obstruction caused by Ascaris worms which is a condition primarily seen in children Piperazine hydrate and piperazine citrate are the main anthelminthic piperazines
